item.title: Alewife (353) mezzanine to busway
item.description: Escalator: Alewife (353) mezzanine to busway is out of service

item.title: Orange Line
item.description:
Orange Line Diversions - Sullivan Square to Oak Grove Saturday-Sunday March 2-3 March 9-10
Monday-Thursday Beginning at 9 p.m. March 4-7
Buses will replace Orange Line trains between Sullivan Square and Oak Grove Stations on the weekends of March 2-3 and March 9-10, 2013. Buses will also replace Orange Line trains between Sullivan Square and Oak Grove Stations beginning at 9:00 p.m. through the end of service Monday through Thursday, March 4-7. The alternate bus service will make stops at all stations between Sullivan Square and Oak Grove Stations. Complete Orange Line service resumes at the start of service on Monday, March 11, 2013, with regular service on Friday, March 8, 2013.
Accessibility: All shuttle bus stops are accessible for persons with disabilities.
Why is this service change in place? This temporary service change is in place while work is performed on the Assembly Station Project.

item.title: Red Line
item.description:
Weekend Red Line Diversion - Harvard to Alewife Stations
February 23-24
Buses will replace Red Line trains between Harvard and Alewife Stations on the weekend of February 23-24. The alternate bus service will make stops at all stations between Harvard and Alewife Stations. Normal Red Line train service will resume for the start of service on Monday, February 25, 2013.
Accessibility: All shuttle bus stops are accessible for persons with disabilities.
Why is this service change in place? This temporary service change is in place while MBTA crews perform track, power, and signal work as part of the Red Line Floating Slab Project.

item.title: Quincy Center (871) lobby to parking garage
item.description: Elevator: Quincy Center (871) lobby to parking garage is out of service until further notice. Customers may utilize adjacent Elevator 810 for service from the unpaid lobby to the center platform.

item.title: Porter Square (818) lobby to Massachusetts Avenue
item.description: Elevator: Porter Square (818) lobby to Massachusetts Avenue will be out of service for replacement beginning Wednesday, January 2, 2013 and is scheduled to return to service during summer 2013. Customers may utilize adjacent station elevator (982) located near the escalators and stairs. Please contact any MBTA station personnel for assistance.

item.title: Arlington (962) outbound platform to lobby
item.description: Due to an earlier power problem, elevators and escalators located at Arlington and Copley Stations are currently out of service.

item.title: Arlington (962) outbound platform to lobby
item.description: Due to an earlier power problem, elevators located at Arlington and Copley Stations are currently out of service.

item.title: Park Street (808) lobby to Red Line center platform
item.description:
Park Street Elevator 808 is out of service. To exit the station at Park Street, exit the Red Line train at Downtown Crossing. Take the elevator to the concourse. Use the elevator located through the glass doors to the left of the CharlieCard Store. This elevator will take you to the lobby of 101 Arch Street, located off of Summer Street.
To board the Red Line, use the elevator located within the 101 Arch building (located off of Summer Street) to reach the Downtown Crossing concourse and access Downtown Crossing Elevator 869 for Alewife-bound Red Line service or Downtown Crossing Elevator 870 for Braintree/Ashmont Red Line service.
